rows.label: qst202501_msg0001
rows.name: What is it, Zeke?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0002
rows.name:
Look over there.
Something's not right...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202501_msg0003
rows.name: Artificial Blades.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0004
rows.name:
So many of them, mo. Why are
they gathered here, mo?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0005
rows.name:
No regularity can be observed in their
actions. It is judged that their
command structure is already lost.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0006
rows.name:
So they're just gathering
here on their own, without
a command structure?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0007
rows.name: Is that even possible?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0008
rows.name:
Are they...[ML:Dash ] in some
kind of berserk state?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0009
rows.name:
That is a simplistic but
sufficient understanding.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0010
rows.name:
Search results show...[ML:Dash ] 67 active
artificial Blades in this vicinity.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0011
rows.name:
If left unattended, the number of
artificial Blades like the ones
before us will continue to increase.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0012
rows.name:
All situations considered, it is judged
that annihilating them at this location
is the optimal course of action.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0013
rows.name:
You want to fight this
many?! [ML:Dash ]Are you serious?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0014
rows.name:
But, as KOS-MOS Re: says,
we don't know what will
happen if we leave them be.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0015
rows.name:
We should dispose of them
before any damage is done.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0016
rows.name:
Hey, KOS-MOS Re:, do
you think we can win?

rows.label: qst202501_msg0017
rows.name: It is possible.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0018
rows.name:
Against this number of enemies,
the probability of our total
annihilation is less than 12%.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0019
rows.name: Whoa, whoa, that's not 100%?!

rows.label: qst202501_msg0020
rows.name:
It is impossible to predict
what may occur during combat.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0021
rows.name:
This predicted value is
judged to be within an
acceptable range of risk.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0022
rows.name: You're terrifyingly calm about this.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0023
rows.name:
The risk increases as the number of
berserk artificial Blades grows.

rows.label: qst202501_msg0024
rows.name:
Please give the order to
commence combat swiftly...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202501_msg0025
rows.name: All right, attack! Let's go!
